cause.description:
-Why do U smoke & u R Sure That Smoking May Kill U? -Why don't u think in ur Future if u r a Young Man? -Why don't U Think in ur Wife & Children if u r Married? -Why don't U Think in ur Health if u r an old Man?
Smoking will KILL YOU SO PLZ STOP IT !! U CAN'T RUN AWAY FROM CANCER , IT WILL GET U IN ALL WAYS & U WON'T FIND ANY CURE COZ IT WILL BE TOO LATE .. SO PLZ STOP IT NT FOR URSELF BT FOR THE OTHERS!!
1. EGYPT !!
cause.name: SmoKing = U've SuccessFully inStalled !!CANCER!!
